item.description:
My Twitch and YouTube channels are a celebration of Desktop Linux ğŸ§ and include live coding on various projects such as Debian, Ubuntu, MATE Desktop ğŸ§‰, Nix â„ and making Raspberry Pi devices. I’m an OBS Studio nerd ğŸ¤“ and love to tinker with effects and interactive features. If you stream using Linux and have questions, please do ask ğŸ‘

Although the channels were started by me, it has become a place for our community to create new projects, collaborate, learn and succeed together. You’re invited to join us ğŸŸ
